author: Geoffrey Rogow
title: 5 Takeaways From Warren Buffett at Berkshire’s Annual Meeting
text: Warren Buffett took questions on succession, Wells Fargo and trade during an eight-hour question-and-answer session Saturday at Berkshire Hathaway Inc.’s annual meeting. Here are five of our biggest takeaways: 1) Succession Will a Berkshire without Mr. Buffett as CEO and Charles Munger as vice chairman have a harder time buying companies? Berkshire has a reputation as Cboe's 'Best Quarter Ever' Doesn't Impress Investors Next Warren Buffett Vs. Elon Musk: Who's Better at Selling Candy?
